item.description:
As part of the "First Thursday" activities, the Wadsworth Atheneum shows a movie that ties to the theme of the event. In March they are showing "La Vie en Rose", the biography of singer Edith Piaf. Winner of two Oscars in 2008, it runs 140 minutes and is in French with subtitles.

Admission to the movies is included in your admission to "First Thursday." I try to come to each film but sometimes work late, so don't let that stop you. Other meetup groups also attend and you might join one of them if you don't find other movie meetup people.

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: "La Vie en Rose" @ First Thursday
